# get-youtube-id

Parse a youtube url returning the video ID.

# Installation

```
npm install get-youtube-id
```

# Example

``` js
var getYouTubeID = require('get-youtube-id');

var id = getYouTubeID("http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bZkp7q19f0");
console.log(id); // "9bZkp7q19f0"
```
